actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: . The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: . Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: . Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: . Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire
actions.desc: . Breath (Recharge. 5-6). The veteran exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Parry
actions.desc: . The veteran adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the veteran must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

name: Half-Red Dragon Veteran
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12
